Lexington-Fayette.UK HealthCare:
UK HealthCare is the health care system that is based on the campus of the University of Kentucky (UK) in Lexington, Kentucky. It consists of the university's hospitals, clinics, outreach locations, and patient care services along with UKs health profession colleges.


== Colleges ==
College of Dentistry
College of Health Sciences
College of Medicine
College of Nursing
College of Pharmacy
College of Public Health


== Hospitals ==

Albert B. Chandler Hospital: The 945 bed medical facility is UK HealthCare's flagship facility and includes numerous components to the University of Kentucky medical system.
